entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #54832
  • Using [FromForm] in Web API controller action when object contains a delegate causes memory leak #54829
  • How to provide instance for BlazorWebView in xaml page to reuse single Text editor component with multiple BlazorWebView #54823
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ControllerBase.Created()` returns a `StatusCodes.Status204NoContent` not `StatusCodes.Status201Created` #54822
  • Brotli compressor not working when compressing small text output #54827
  • .net core 是否在Aot支持反射功能这一块 #54817
  • Avoid magic string in asp-page-handler #54816

Closed

  • [feat] Add `PasswordOptions.RequireLetter` #54341
  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54712
  • SDK is missing some packages for .NET Framework targets #54696
  • Avoid resetting AccessFailedCount by CheckPasswordSignIn in ASP.Net Identity #54733
  • .NET 8 Blazor Web App with ADFS/OpenId Connect throws error unless I turn off SSL validation when hosted in AKS #54831
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #54819
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #54820
  • Programmatically set preventDefault and stopPropagation #54782
  • Blazor handling of overlay components #54768
  • Enhanced navigation triggers the initialization of layout components #54794
  • DataAnnotationsValidator fails to [in]validate on submit a model that it successfully [in]validates while editing #54792
  • Blazor PWA not fetching app when its cached -> cannot work offline #54767
  • DataProtectionProvider persist keys to BLOB does not use keys from BLOB #54697
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor WASM - API authorization disappears on refresh #54666
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #54764
  • SecurityTokenMalformedException after updating to .NET 8 #52286
  • ClaimsPrincipal on ASP.NET Core v8.0.100-rc.2.23502.2 Doesn't Contain All Claims From The OpenIdConnect Token #51538
  • shaw 256 Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource .net 8 #54558

PullRequests

Created

  • DO NOT MERGE - install scripts check #54828
    area-infrastructure
  • Handle JSON comments and trailing commas in user-jwts #54826
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • [Blazor] Port interactive server root component fix to `main` #54833
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Test fixes #54825
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add entry-point APIs for OpenAPI support #54789
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54763
    Servicing-consider, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Increase logs and delays in CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54608
    area-blazor, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #54508
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
